name: Minimal space to live
description:
Minimal space to live is a casual puzzle game where you have to move all your old furniture to a new home. The problem lies in the fact that this new home is very small. So small that you would doubt if it's the minimum space to live.

Game created and submitted for Newbies GameJam 2022

       Controls

This game uses mouse and keyboard as controller. Here are the controls detailed.

 - Keyboard arrows: Move and rotate the camera.

 - Mouse rightclick: Select and place furniture where the mouse is pointing.

 - Mouse wheel: Rotate the selected furniture.

 - Escape: Open and close pause menu. 

 - You can interact with any element of the interface using the mouse.

Tip:
 - Something may happen if you enter a famous cheat code while in the game menu ;)
